name: Salesforce Force.com Developer Console Dark Theme
description: A dark sublime-like theme (Monokai) for Salesforce's Force.com Developer Console for developers who miss Sublime Text while coding on Developer console

user.name: chirag64
user.about: A curious computer geek... Writes code for fun and money, likes to read random stuff on internet, pattern-recognizing automaton.
